asthma.description: Asthma crisis severity in a 0 to 5 scale.

alergy.description: Alergy crisis severity in a 0 to 5 scale.

food.description: Food eaten in that moment. Could be one or more foods.

energy.description: Energy level in a 0 to 5 scale, being 0 falling sleep and 5 extraordinary exitement.

sleep.description: Number of hours slept in the previous night.

caffeine.description: Amount of caffeine ingested in diverse units.

water.description: Amount of water drank in liters. If a container is given, convert it to liters. For example, one glass of water is 0.25 liters

datetime.description: The date and time in which data was collected. The date will be formated as DD.MM.YYYY and the time as HH:mm:ss
